verified.description: Indicates if the user's account is verified.

role.description: The role or position of the user.

items.description: A tag associated with the user.

chat_only.description: Specifies if the user can only participate in chat interactions.

role_type.description: The type of role assigned to the user.

phone.description: The phone number associated with the user.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization the user belongs to.

details.description: Additional details or information about the user.

email.description: The email address associated with the user.

only_private_comments.description: Indicates if the user can only create private comments.

restricted_agent.description: Specifies if the user is a restricted agent.

moderator.description: Specifies if the user has moderator privileges.

updated_at.description: The datetime when the user account was last updated.

external_id.description: An external identifier for the user.

time_zone.description: The time zone of the user.

photo.description: Information about the user's profile photo.

thumbnails.description: Thumbnails of the user's profile photo.

inline.description: Specifies if the thumbnail should be displayed inline.

content_url.description: The URL to access the thumbnail content.

content_type.description: The content type of the thumbnail.

file_name.description: The file name of the thumbnail.

mapped_content_url.description: The mapped URL to access the thumbnail content.

url.description: The URL of the user's profile photo.

inline.description: Specifies if the photo should be displayed inline.

content_url.description: The URL to access the photo content.

content_type.description: The content type of the photo.

file_name.description: The file name of the photo.

mapped_content_url.description: The mapped URL to access the photo content.

shared.description: Indicates if the user's account is shared.

created_at.description: The datetime when the user account was created.

suspended.description: Indicates if the user's account is suspended.

shared_agent.description: Specifies if the user is a shared agent.

shared_phone_number.description: Specifies if the user has a shared phone number.

user_fields.description: Custom fields associated with the user.

last_login_at.description: The datetime of the user's last login.

alias.description: An alternative name or identifier for the user.

two_factor_auth_enabled.description: Specifies if two-factor authentication is enabled for the user.

notes.description: Any notes or comments related to the user.

default_group_id.description: The default group ID for the user.

url.description: The URL of the user's details.

active.description: Indicates if the user is currently active.

permanently_deleted.description: Specifies if the user has been permanently deleted.

locale_id.description: The locale ID of the user.

custom_role_id.description: The custom role ID assigned to the user.

locale.description: The preferred locale of the user.

report_csv.description: The report in CSV format associated with the user.

iana_time_zone.description: The IANA time zone of the user.
